welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Solaro, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and delicious cuisine. We invite you to immerse yourself in its culture and heritage, and to enjoy all the wonders that Solaro has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited to certain areas or have a time limit.
